summary: This mod adds a small player home to the Falkreath Hold fit for any adventurer of Skyrim. It comes with tons of custom clutter and storage and includes all the bare essential for an adventurer of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][b][size=6][color=#ff0000] [/color][color=#ffff00]**Mod is offered as is and works as intended, no further updates**[/color][/size][color=#ffff00]
[/color][/b]
[size=4][img]http://www.clker.com/cliparts/q/l/e/v/h/f/ivy-vine-hi.png[/img]
Thank you to everyone for the amazing support and feedback, never expected my first mod to do this well! love ya all <3[/size][/font][/center][font=Verdana][size=4][center]More to come in the future![/center]
[/size][/font][center][size=4][font=Verdana]Video [/font][/size][font=Verdana][size=4]courtesy of[/size][/font] [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton][size=4]Hodilton[/size]
[/url][size=4]Thank you!

[youtube]kx_F8WKjq4Q[/youtube]
[color=#cccccc]
[/color][/size][color=#cccccc]:: Small note ::
[/color][/center][center]         [size=4]This mod is my first attempt at any form of "modding" for any game. I hope you have as much fun playing with it as I did creating it![/size]
 [font=Verdana][size=4]Constructive feedback and criticism is always encouraged. Simply saying "This mod sucks!" without giving a reason does not help me, or you. So.. please if your leaving criticism make sure its at least constructive[/size][/font][/center][font=Verdana]
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6][center]:: Location ::[/center][/color][/size][/font][center][font=Verdana][size=4]The House marker will automatically appear on the map, but you won't be able to fast travel there straight away! Look in the Falkreath Hold. Oh... and the key is laying on the armour workbench, you can't miss it.

[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][color=#b6b6b6][size=5]:: Description ::[/size][/color]
[size=4]
Ivy Crest is a small, simple and cosy player home located in the in the Falkreath Hold. It includes all the bare essentials for surviving the harsh and unforgiving climate of Skyrim. Tons of custom storage, clutter and textures give this house a feeling like no other. The home is located just
up the stone path from Half-Moon Mill.  [/size][/font][/center][font=Verdana]
[/font][center][font=Verdana][size=5][color=#ffff00]:: Requirements ::[/color]
[/size][size=4]
A copy of Skyrim and all of its DLCs (Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn)

[color=#ffff00]NOTE:[/color][color=#ff0000] [/color]I have no plans for making a version that is compatible with just the base game. It would mean changing certain aspects of this house that I'm currently not willing to make + I'm lazy, sue me.

[/size][/font][color=#b6b6b6][size=5]:: Features ::
[font=Verdana]
[/font][/size][/color][/center][center][font=Verdana][size=4]- 4 Hearthfire style planters 
- 4 weapon racks 
- Interior Day & night cycle 
- Custom alchemy apparatus 
- Custom Enchanting table
- 1 Anvil 
- Armour workbench
- Fully Navmeshed 
- TES5Edit cleaned 
- Tons of custom storage 
- Tons of custom clutter
- Fully functional key (click on key when in your inventory to lock the door behind you)[/size][/font][/center][font=Verdana]
[/font][center][font=Verdana][size=5][color=#ffff00]:: Compatibility ::[/color]
[/size]
[size=4]Anything that edits the cell (location) of this house will not be compatible. Co-ordinates:  -13  -14
Incompatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47989/?]Legendary Cities - Tes Arena - Skyrim Frontier Fortress[/url][/size][/font][/center][font=Verdana][size=3]
[/size][/font][center][font=Verdana][color=#b6b6b6][size=5]::Installation ::[/size][/color]

[/font][list]
[*][font=Verdana][size=4]You know the drill. Download with your preferred mod manager, active the plugin, run [url=https://loot.github.io/]LOOT[/url].[/size][/font]
[*][font=Verdana][size=4]DONE![/size][/font]
[/list][/center][center][font=Verdana][size=5]
[color=#b6b6b6]:: Credits and Permissions ::[/color][/size]

[size=4] See [color=#ffff00]perms tab[/color] for a full list of credits and everything you need to know about permissions for this file![/size]
[size=4]If you have any further questions about the permissions and credits of this mod send me a PM[/size]
[color=#38761d][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][size=5][color=#b6b6b6]:: Help and Troubleshooting ::[/color]
[/size]
[font=Verdana][size=4]Please leave any questions you have about this mod in the comment section, I'll try and answer them in the best way possible[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Verdana]
[/font][center][/center][font=Verdana][center][color=#b6b6b6][size=5]:: Mods Used in Screenshots ::[/size][/color]
[size=4]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url] 
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19446/?]The Skyrim Distance Overhaul LOD Improvement[/url] 
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]SkyFalls + SkyMills[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant - A Skyrim Grass Plugin[/url] 
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?] Immersive HUD[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534/?]Kountervibe ENB Northern Light (Extreme)[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog [/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX (Interiors only)[/url][/size][/center][/font]
[center][font=Verdana][color=#38761d]
[/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#b6b6b6][size=5]:: Chang log ::[/size][/color]
[size=4]
[i]Version 1.05[/i]

 - Removes a couple of dirty edits that I missed the first time around
 - Removes 1 out of the 2 deleted navmesh. Please read the paragraph bellow[/size][/font][/center][font=Verdana][size=4]
[center][color=#ffff00]Important: [/color]the one deleted navmesh that is still present in the new update is supposed to be there, please don't try to remove it as it will break the mod.[/center][/size][/font]
author: Boric123
